Live Face: an image of a real live face

Print: an image of a printed photo of a face

Replay: a replayed video of a person's face

a face shown on a screen in front of a camera
Cutouts: a face cut out from a photo

Transparent: a transparent mask of a face

Plaster: a plaster mask mimicking a human face
a person wearing a plaster face mask

Resin: a resin mask of a person's face

Attribute-Edit: a face with digitally edited features

fake eyes or mouth added to a real face

Face-Swap: a swapped face between two people

Video-Driven: a fake face driven by someone else's movements

Pixel-Level: a face with pixel-level adversarial noise

Semantic-Level: a face changed in semantically meaningful ways

ID_Consisnt: a synthetic face with a consistent identity
generated images of the same fake person

Style: a face generated in a stylized form

Prompt: an AI-generated face from a text prompt
